title: Kung Fu Boy
description: It was predicted that a youth would come to the Dailin Temple.  He would have a fist of iron, legs of stone, and thought and vision of crystal clarity.  With his natural intelligence and extraordinary skills in the ancient Chinese art of unarmed combat, could the fearless Chinmi be the long-awaited Magic Fist?Dell's Ironfist books are authentic Japanese Manga (comics), printed to read back-to-front, with English replacing the original Japanese text for American Manga fans.  Already a hit in the U.K., Ironfist promises to introduce the exciting world of Manga to young people across the country.
author: Takeshi Maekawa
